ComicInfo.Summary: NO SURVIVORS is an interesting Korean war story about american soldiers facing overwhelming enemy force. As a philosophical methaphor this story uses ants. Yeah. Read it. THE FACE OF THE ENEMY is also set in Korean war. It tells the story of wounded american lone survivor who has to judge wether his enemy is trustworthy. ROAD BLOCK is a story about breaking thru enemy positions in North Africa. FINAL MISSION is a story about naval air war in Korea.
ComicInfo.Tags: United States Navy,United States Army,United States Marine Corps

ComicInfo.Title: No Survivors
